resources.string: No notification permission to start service.
Notification permission granted, please start the service again.
Background running permission granted, please start the service again.
Are you sure to delete this data? Unable to restore after deletion!
Are you sure to delete all data? Unable to restore after deletion!
The battery is full, please remove the charger and start recording

Battery Log is a software to record battery voltage, current, temperature and other parameters, which can be used to test battery charge/discharge curves and temperature. \nAlso, the data can be exported and saved in CSV format.

This project uses the following open source libraries: 
 
AndroidX Libraries (Apache License 2.0) 
• androidx.core:core-ktx 
• androidx.activity:activity-ktx 
• androidx.appcompat:appcompat 
• androidx.preference:preference-ktx 
• androidx.fragment:fragment-ktx 
• androidx.constraintlayout:constraintlayout 
• androidx.room (room-runtime, room-ktx, room-compiler) 
• androidx.lifecycle (viewmodel-ktx, livedata-ktx, common-java8) 
• androidx.camera (camera2, lifecycle, view) 
• androidx.navigation (fragment-ktx, ui-ktx, dynamic-features-fragment) 
https://source.android.com/license
